1.0.6.name: wordpress/resize-images-while-uploading
1.0.6.description:
The "Auto Image Resizer" is a state of the art WordPress Plugin which reduces your uploaded images to the maximal used image dimensions of your WordPress website.

If the uploaders (author, member, whoever) browsers supports HTML5, Gears, Flash or Silverlight the images will be resized directly on the client otherwise the server will do that. So the Auto Image Resizer plugin works in every case regardless of the clients browser or OS.

In this version of Auto Image Resizer some features are not available. You will find notices on several places in the backend that the described feature is part of the
